title.description: Heading displayed above the table (e.g. "Recommended Soil Testing Packages")

note.description: Optional introductory sentence shown between the heading and the table

content.description: Markdown table. Use GFM pipe syntax: | Col1 | Col2 |. Escape | inside cells as \|

clarifications.description: Footnotes shown below the table (e.g. * = rush fee applies). One per line.
